descriptionMarkdown:
This will precisely load a train according to the items listed in a constant combinator by modulating the stack size of a filtered stack inserter. The box must be serviced by a Logistics network and is limited to 12 items by the capacity of the requester chest. The stack inserter can be replaced with a standard filter inserter if desired.

To add more capacity or cars, copy and paste the main circuit including the power pole. Just link a red wire between the attached power poles. 

**Limitations**:
- Missing items cause the system to lock in somewhat unpredictable places until the items are available, ensure that your logistics network can service the requests.
- Setting a train in the station to 'Manual' mode will cause the inserter to insert one stack. 
- The loop size is hard-coded into the logic to save space, modifying the logic may cause strange behavior.

**How it works**

The circuit cycles through hand sizes starting at 12. It subtracts (Hand - 1) from the requested items in each cycle and compares it to (-1)*[Train Contents]. If anything is positive, the circuit waits until all items are loaded. Due to factorio circuit performance, the condition that increments the loop pulses for 8 ticks. Rather than adding a proper pulse generator, I compensated for the pulse duration by hard-coding (cycle/8) into several circuit conditions.
title: Magic train loader
